title: INCREDIBLY RELEASING CRISIS Part 1 / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
The woman is a student of Dr. Paret, which participated in his recent non-verbal hypnosis masterclass in Brazil. There, she and the other students learned the most unique non-verbal hypnosis techniques. In this video, Dr. Paret will demonstrate us a powerful releasing crisis, that liberated the woman deeply. A hypnotic crisis heal our negative emotions and traumas, and change us in a positive way. See what happens in the next part of this video series, when the non-verbal hypnotic experience continues stronger. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
